divs: sighting detailsi was walking down lonely st around 8:40 p.m on monday august 12 2013 with my husband. we were headed from barnes st down towards burholme st. on my left, there were 4 people staring up to the sky. i overheard the man mention a few things about aliens\ ufos. when i looked up i noticed a object (around the size of a helicopter or plane in the distance) it was a pulsating fireball of multiple colors. i made the mistake of continuing to walk and look up at it.. before i knew it, it would disappear in the distance (ascending? but not straight up). it is hard to say how far it was from me but it gave off a very large glowing "flame." it didn't make a sound. i'm curious if this was an ufo or maybe some flaming space treasures?
trends: There have been 216 other sightings in Philadelphia
There were no other sightings in Philadelphia on or around August 12th 2013
Summary: fireball object hovering in Fox Chase/ Rockledge
